original_text: The firstfruit also of thy corn, of thy wine, and of thine oil, and the first of the fleece of thy sheep, shalt thou give him.
korean_text: 또 네가 처음 거둔 곡식과 포도주와 기름과 네가 처음 깎은 양털을 네가 그에게 줄 것이니

sentences.original_text: The firstfruit also of thy corn
of thy wine, and of thine oil
and the first of the fleece of thy sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 양의 털가지 첫 것
